byline.contributor: Diaa Hadid reported from Tel Aviv, and Rick Gladstone from New York.
byline.original: By DIAA HADID and RICK GLADSTONE

abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu announces plans to build 18.6-mile fence along portion of Jordanian border that security officials see as possible route of terrorists or illegal immigrants.
lead_paragraph: The plan will move Israel closer to completely surrounding itself with physical barriers.

headline.main: Israel to Build Fence Along at Least Part of Jordan Frontier
headline.print_headline: Israel Plans Fence for Part of Jordan Border

snippet: The plan will move Israel closer to completely surrounding itself with physical barriers.
